Class PosterUseCase

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.PosterUseCase
public final class PosterUseCase extends Object
Coordinates protocol-specific poster pipelines that render reconstructed traffic for reporting.

Each configured protocol runs in its own task; not thread-safe for concurrent run(PosterConfig) invocations.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PosterUseCase()
    Creates a poster use case with the default protocol pipelines (HTTP, TN3270).
    PosterUseCase(Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines)
    Creates a poster use case with custom protocol pipeline implementations.

      public PosterUseCase(Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(PosterConfig config) throws Exception
      Runs the configured poster pipelines based on CLI configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - poster configuration describing protocol inputs and outputs
      Throws:
      Exception - if a pipeline fails or required configuration is missing
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
      Implementation Note:
      Launches worker threads when multiple protocols are enabled simultaneously.
